name: Tesla Model X
description: Model X is the safest SUV ever. Built from the ground up as an electric vehicle, the body, chassis, restraints and battery technology provide a very low probability of occupant injury.

name: Audi R8
description: Limited to only 50 units, the 2020 R8 Decennium edition features a Mythos black exterior, matte bronze 20-inch milled-cut wheels and matte bronze intake manifold, along with a gloss black front spoiler, side sills and rear diffuser. Coupled with an interior finished entirely in black, inlays in gloss carbon fiber and quilted rhombus stitching in a copper tone, the R8 V10 Decennium edition pays tribute to its V10 heritage.

name: Fiat 124 Spider
description: An exclusive and origin driving experience in a sports car with an iconic 1960s design. Returning to fill you with excitement each time you touch the sterring wheel.
